          <title>
            <string language="sv">Förkrossad</string>
            <string language="en">Broken-hearted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Untröstlich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au coeur brisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Broken-hearted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Broken-hearted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συντετρημμένος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Broken-hearted</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Någon vilar huvudet i händerna sittande på bänk.</string>
            <string language="en">Someone resting his head in his hands while sitting on a bench .</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">förkrossad</string>
            <string language="en">devastated</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">besviken</string>
            <string language="en">disappointed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ledsen</string>
            <string language="en">sad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jemand, das seinen Kopf in seinen Händen beim 
Sitzen auf einer Bank stillsteht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelqu'un reposant sa tête dans des ses mains 
tout en se reposant sur un mettre hors jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alguém que descansa sua cabeça em suas mãos ao
sentar-se em um banco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qualcuno che riposa la sua testa in sue mani 
mentre sedendosi su un banco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάποιος που στηρίζεται το κεφάλι του στα χέρια του 
καθμένος σε έναν πάγκο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alguien que reclina su cabeza en sus manos 
mientras que se sienta en un banco.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">verwüstet</string>
